message.name: ERR_GOAL_FV_REFERENCE_EXISTS
message.locale: A goal with the reference specified already exists. Goal reference must be unique.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_FV_NAME_BLANK
message.locale: The name must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A goal with the name specified already exists. Goal name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_FV_CANCELED
message.locale: This goal has already been canceled.
This goal has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_FV_CANCELED_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: This goal is cancelled and cannot be modified.
This goal is canceled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_XRV_TEMPLATES_EXIST
message.locale: The goal cannot be cancelled as there are existing templates based on it.
The goal cannot be canceled as there are existing templates based on it.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_XFV_SUBGOAL_EXISTS
message.locale: This sub goal has already been assigned to the goal and cannot be assigned again.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_XFV_OUTCOME_EXISTS
message.locale: This outcome has already been assigned to the goal and cannot be assigned again.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_XFV_CONTRACTTEXT_EXISTS
message.locale: Contract text for the specified language already exists.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_SERVICEPLAN
message.locale: This goal is assigned to at least one service plan and cannot be cancelled.
This goal is assigned to at least one service plan and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_GOAL_XRV_PLANTEMPLATESUBGOAL_ASSIGNED_TO_PLANTEMPLATE
message.locale: This sub goal cannot be removed from this goal. There is an existing plan template sub goal based on this sub goal and assigned to a plan template based on this goal.
